title: My Money Got Charged and I Didn't Get My RP
body: So I got a gift card for christmas, and wanted to buy an rp card, so i added the card to my paypal, and proceeded to try and buy a $20's worth of RP. I got an error message that said that the card was rejected, but i checked the balance on the card and the $20 was taken out of it. I then tried to buy $5 of RP and surprisingly the card worked... But I still havent gotten the $20's of RP on my account and the money has been taken."

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  It may have still been pending, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if this is still an issue.  Our billing team can help out!
my bad I didn't see this until now, but it got resolved ty <3
